moreBlocks.lawyersAtLeenChase&DufourSelectedForASup: • Leen, David J. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
At the law firm of Leen Chase & Dufour, in Bangor, Maine, we understand that after injuries, people need to focus on their recovery. When the accident happened at work or was caused by the negligence of another, obtaining compensation may add complications that are difficult to manage. The attorneys at our law firm have decades of experience with workers' compensation cases, claims for Social Security benefits and personal injury cases.

From the free initial consultation until the resolution of the case, we take the time to get to know our clients, giving them the individual attention they deserve. We handle communications with representatives and keep our clients informed every step of the way, so they understand all their options and the progress of their case.

Social Security benefits

Leen Chase & Dufour takes cases involving Social Security Disability benefits, retirement benefits and survivors benefits. We help clients complete paperwork and gather the necessary documentation. Our attorneys also have experience appealing denied claims.

Personal injury cases

Our law firm fights for clients' rights to full and fair compensation in cases involving negligent or reckless drivers, construction accidents, dangerous property conditions, medical mistakes, birth injuries, brain injuries and wrongful death.

Clients may request virtual appointments for their comfort and convenience, and we offer credit card payment options.
